sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"使惊愕，使惊讶，使惊奇"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: surprise, amaze, astonish, astound, startle, stun
means: surprise ： 普通用词，多指因未预料或意外的事而引起的惊奇之感。
amaze ： 语气较强，指因认为不可能或极少可能发生情况的出现而感到惊讶或迷惑不解。
astonish ： 语气较强，指出乎预料，意外发生，但又无法解释而感到惊奇。
astound ： 语气强，指由于事情令人难以置信或实在罕见而使人感到震惊。
startle ： 指因突然的惊吓或意料不到的刺激等而使人惊跳或震惊。
stun ： 语气最强，指极度惊讶而目瞪口呆，不知所措。

sentence.Network_en: Electric rays stun their prey with huge electrical discharges.
sentence.Network_cn: 电鳐能放出强大的电流把猎物击晕。

sentence.Network_en: A guard zapped him with the stun gun.
sentence.Network_cn: 一名警卫用眩晕枪击中了他。

sentence.Network_en: The snake uses its venom to stun or paralyze its victims.
sentence.Network_cn: 蛇用其毒液使受害者失去知觉或瘫痪.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2011考研英语新增大纲词汇 - 豆丁网 ... stroll vi. 漫步，闲逛n.散步 stun vt. 使昏迷；使发愣 n.晕眩 subsidy n. 补助金，津贴.
击昏(Stun)：使敌人昏炫(Lv 1 A.R +15%，时间1.2 sec，之后每级加5%，延长0.2sec)，对付金色小王和Boss用，因为能使敌人昏炫…
野蛮人——战斗技能系技能-暗黑破坏神2中文资料站 ... 双手投掷 Double Throw 击晕 Stun 跳跃攻击 Leap Attack.
老托Part C原文及生词 ... devote:v. 作……标点符号 stun:v. 使晕倒，打晕 prey:n. 猎物.

list.abs: 而电击枪(Stun gun) 乃是1990s 早年﹐美国交给警方使用的非致命武器﹐亦被美国及台湾监视系统内的有关安治人员(使用隐形科技) …
震爆弹（stun grenades）（Stun grenades）又称为震撼弹、眩晕弹、眩晕手榴弹等，属于非致命性武器，用于在制服对方时尽可能不造成永久性的身体 …
震撼弹（Stun Grenade），俗名叫闪光弹（Flashbang）。从它的英文名可以看出来，震撼弹的主要目的是“Flash”和“Bang”，即一种 …
提出心肌顿抑(myocardial stunning)的概念，系指短时间的心肌缺血不发生坏死，但引起的结构、代谢和功能改变在再灌注后需数小时 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: shortening of Old French estoner 'astonish'

encyclopedia.content: STUN（Simple Traversal of UDP over NATs，NAT 的UDP简单穿越）是一种网络协议，它允许位于NAT（或多重NAT）后的客户端找出自己的公网地址，查出自己位于哪种类型的NAT之后以及NAT为某一 个本地端口所绑定的Internet端端口。这些信息被用来在两个同时处于NAT 路由器之后的主机之间建立UDP通信。该协议由RFC 3489定义。

entry.tran: 使震惊;使目瞪口呆;使惊愕
entry.def: If you are stunned by something, you are extremely shocked or surprised by it and are therefore unable to speak or do anything.

example.ex: Many cinema-goers were stunned by the film's violent and tragic end.
example.tran: 许多来看电影的人都被这部影片暴力而悲惨的结局所震惊。

entry.def: If something such as a blow on the head stuns you, it makes you unconscious or confused and unsteady.

example.ex: Sam stood his ground and got a blow that stunned him.
example.tran: 萨姆站在原地，被一下打昏了。

means.word_mean: 1. make senseless or dizzy by or as if by a blow;
2. surprise greatly; knock someone's socks off;

sentences.sentence: "I was floored when I heard that I was promoted"

means.word_mean: 3. hit something or somebody as if with a sandbag
4. overcome as with astonishment or disbelief;

auth_sentence.content: They used a Taser gun to stun one of the suspects.
auth_sentence.res_content: They used a Taser gun to stun one of the suspects.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They used a Taser gun to stun one of the suspects.

auth_sentence.res_content: Was the dual use of the stun gun and firearms justified and proportionate?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Was the dual use of the stun gun and firearms justified and proportionate?

auth_sentence.res_content: The firefighters suffered minor injuries from stun grenades armed police threw in the rescue raid.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The firefighters suffered minor injuries from stun grenades armed police threw in the rescue raid.

sentences.en: The robber stunned the guard by banging him on the head.
sentences.cn: 抢劫犯猛击那个卫兵的头部使他晕了过去。

means.word_mean: 使大吃一惊, 使震惊

sentences.en: This film stunned the movie world in 1955.
sentences.cn: 那部影片在1955年使电影界震惊。

jushi.english: We were stunned by her beauty.
jushi.chinese: 我们被她的美丽惊呆了。

jushi.english: This film stunned the movie world in 1955.
jushi.chinese: 这部影片在1955年震惊了电影界。
